mapper.insert: insert into patient (patient_name, patient_belong, patient_phone, patient_sex, patient_create_time, patient_last_edit_time, patient_describe, patient_src) values (#{patientName}, #{patientBelong}, #{patientPhone}, #{patientSex}, #{patientCreateTime}, #{patientLastEditTime}, #{patientDescribe}, #{patientSrc})
mapper.select: select count(*) from patient where patient_sex = '男' and to_days(now()) = to_days(patient_create_time)
select count(*) from patient where patient_sex = '女' and to_days(now()) = to_days(patient_create_time)
select count(*) from patient where hour(timediff(time(patient_create_time), '00:00:00')) = #{hour} + 0 and to_days(now()) = to_days(patient_create_time)
select count(*) from patient where patient_bed is not null and hour(timediff(time(patient_create_time), '00:00:00')) = #{hour} + 0 and to_days(now()) = to_days(patient_create_time)
